meanings.definition: A device in a vehicle that measures the distance traveled.
meanings.sent1: The odometer in the car showed we had driven 100 miles.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic checked the odometer to see how far the car had gone.
meanings.sent3: The odometer in the old truck seemed to have a mind of its own, jumping numbers randomly.
meanings.sent4: Her love for travel was like an odometer, always counting the miles of adventure.
meanings.sent5: The odometer clicked loudly as it recorded each mile of the journey.

meanings.definition: The total distance covered by a vehicle as recorded by an odometer.
meanings.sent1: The odometer reading on the dashboard displayed 5000 miles.
meanings.sent2: The odometer reading was high, indicating the car had been driven extensively.
meanings.sent3: The odometer reading was so high that it seemed like the car had circled the Earth multiple times.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work was like an odometer reading, showing the long journey he had taken to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The odometer reading was etched in his memory, a reminder of the miles he had traveled.
